title: One point doesn't been drawn when SKPath draw to negative horizontal
body:
### Description
When SKPath has a line command of drawing toward negative horizontal, one point doesn't been drawn

### Code

            var bitmap = new SKBitmap(800, 800);
            var canvas = new SKCanvas(bitmap);
            canvas.Clear(SKColors.White);
            var paint = new SKPaint
            {
                Color = SKColors.Red,
                Style = SKPaintStyle.Stroke
            };
            var path = SKPath.ParseSvgPathData("M 1 0 L 100 0, 100 100, 0 100");
            canvas.DrawPath(path, paint);


### Expected Behavior

   Expect point(100, 100) been drawn

### Actual Behavior

  point(100, 100) doesn't been drawn

### Basic Information

- Version with issue:  none
- Last known good version:  1.60.0.0
- IDE:  VS 2017
- Platform Target Frameworks:  .net framework 4.61
  - Windows Classic:  PC windows 10
- Target Devices: PC
   

### Screenshots

![20180808181506](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17719459/43831600-3d175c38-9b37-11e8-85ec-6652a442ba18.png)



### Reproduction Link

> VS bug [#742853](https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/742853)
